blog.name: ao3feed-shouji
blog.title: Shouji Mezou
blog.description: An automatic feed of fics for Shouji Mezou from My Hero Academia posted on Archive of Our Own. If there's an issue or if you have any questions, let me know! (For those on mobile, search "tags" to see the taglist!)

title: Familiarity and Shared Scarves
description:
by little_bit_outside

It’s been a while, and Amajiki as found himself comfortable just being friends with two extroverts which are Mirio and Nejire. However, there was one more extrovert who is making his way to be his friend after a month and a half of not seeing each other- Kirishima Eijirou.

or

Two people who had found themselves meeting each other again; one being a ray of sunshine the other can’t help but just accept anyways.

Words: 2615, Chapters: 1/6, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of =Brighter than the sun=

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Amajiki Tamaki, Kirishima Eijirou, Class 1A, Midoriya Izuku, Uraraka Ochako, Toogata Mirio, Nejire Hadou, Kaminari Denki, Ashido Mina, mentioned Yaoyorozu Momo - Character, mentioned Iida Tenya - Character, Sero Hanta, Bakugou Katsuki, Mentioned Jirou Kyouka - Character, mentioned Tokoyami Fumikage - Character, Mentioned Shinsou Hitoshi - Character, Toyomitsu Taishirou | Fat Gum, Takeyama Yuu | Mount Lady, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, mentioned Shouji Mezou - Character, Asui Tsuyu
  • Relationships: Amajiki Tamaki/Kirishima Eijirou, the rest of the ships are minor ships whoops-, Bakugou Katsuki/Kaminari Denki, mentioned Aoyama Yuuga/Monoma Neito, Toogata Mirio/Nejire Hadou, Midoriya Izuku/Asui Tsuyu
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Art School, Accquaintances to Friends, Fluff, Japan starts their School at April y'all, I have no idea how art schools work, Cherry Blossoms, No beta we die like the men Kirishima would want us to be, Kirishima is a ray of sunshine, Shinsou Hitoshi Replaces Mineta Minoru

title: Yeah, That's Right, You're Mine!
description:
by decadentbynature

It was a instinct. Nothing he let himself think about it because he didn’t need to. Bakugo knew instinctively that Deku was an Omega. Despite that, it still comes as a surprise when he gets to his dorm to find Deku sprawled out on his bed, Bakugo’s hero costume plastered to his face, shamelessly masturbating as he cries out his name.

Well, no matter. Since Deku is an Omega, then there’s nothing holding him back from claiming him, right?

tags: this is what I mean when I say I have too many projects
title: WIPs and Ideas
body:
This is kind of a collection of things I’ve been working on / ideas that I have. Some have been posted, some haven’t been. This list is *just* going to be projects I have in mind for BNHA and will not include other fandom pieces that are in the wings. This is because BNHA is basically consuming my life and until I return to a modicum of ‘balance’ it’s probably the only thing I’ll be writing consistently for.

Everything’s under the cut! because it’s uh. Long.

Burden to Bear [Here]- Most of you know this one! Bio!dadmight, Izuku has a mutated quirk alongside one for all. Izuku continues on his path to follow in his father’s footsteps, and Inko is… unhappy that both of the people she cares the most about have no sense of self preservation.

Currently we just finished Kamino Ward. Ah, I can say without providing too many spoilers that I have up to the internship arc planned with some stuff that has to happen after that, so there’s a significant amount left in the story.

Wingbeat of a Butterfly - TodoDeku; bio!dadmight time travel AU. Adult pro heroes Duality and Deku are hit by an unknown quirk and they disappear from their world, only to wake up in the bodies of their teenage selves. They begin preparing immediately for the horrors that await them in the future while struggling to prevent anyone from catching on that things are not what they should be. Chaos ensues eventually. This is planned as my primary project after Burden to Bear.

Brittle Glass Beneath my Skin - Kidnapped!Villain Izuku, possible bio!dadmight, possibly not. Izuku was gifted a quirk by AFO, but also is under the influence of a number of quirks and carefully managed handling to ensure his near-complete loyalty. By the time he resurfaces it may be too late to save him, but will that stop All Might from trying? (No it absolutely will not). I’m considering adding a level of pain and memory sharing soulmate to this AU, but I haven’t actually…. decided that.

The Secrets Between Us - This is an extremely dark soulmate AU centering on Todoroki and Midoriya. It’s loosely (very loosely) based on the premise of Kimi no Na Wa (“Your Name”) in that they swap bodies with each other when they sleep regularly. The similarities basically end there. This story will explore a heightened level of abuse in the Todoroki home and the effects that has on Shouto as well as on Izuku who is forced to keep those secrets too. 

Razor Thin Line - This is a project that is actually the first thing I thought of when I started watching BNHA, somewhere around the Stain arc. I’m biding my time on it because I don’t know if I can do it justice. It’s meant to be a series of short(er) fics that examine the thin line between heroes and villains and between good and evil. The first installment is intended to heavily feature Shouto/Endeavor/Touya(Dabi). I’m open to suggestions of other heroes/villains/ideas to explore!

Rise from the Ashes - Vigilante Todoroki Siblings (all of them!). They are free from Endeavor, but only for as long as they can evade capture. Basically Touya takes his siblings with him when he runs away, and they grow up a little rougher than they may have otherwise, but together.

Sins of the Father [Here] - This was not supposed to be a multi-shot but uh. What can I say except my brain ran with it. Angsty Dad for One. All Might becomes acutely aware of the fact that his nemesis has a family. Enjoy the slight cliffhanger oneshot and be happy in the knowledge it will grow at some point. P:

Untitled Fantasy AU - Inspired by an AU that @thatfunkyopossum talked about with me one day (because I came forward with tododeku fantasy askldjfsdkljf xD) Prince Shouto, Genie Izuku, Rebel Leader Touya. Vague premise is that Shouto receives an ornate box with a puzzle lock as a birthday gift and he eventually opens it to find… a tiny genie Izuku who offers him the standard three wishes. Things get uh, Interesting.

I’ve also got some plans for a TodoDeku Swan Princess Au. But it’s just a vague…. idea right now.

AND

We Are Not Alone [here] - Painsharing Soul Mate AU pieces. Additional one shots will probably be added to it sporadically. They are mostly play pieces tbh and are a little choppier because I tend to write them in one or two writing sessions and release them.

Everything’s under the cut! because it’s uh. Long.

We Are Not Alone [here] - Painsharing Soul Mate AU pieces. Additional one shots will probably be added to it sporadically. They are mostly play pieces tbh and are a little choppier because I tend to write them in one or two writing sessions and release them.
trail.content_abstract:
This is kind of a collection of things I’ve been working on / ideas that I have. Some have been posted, some haven’t been. This list is *just* going to be projects I have in mind for BNHA and will not include other fandom pieces that are in the wings. This is because BNHA is basically consuming my life and until I return to a modicum of ‘balance’ it’s probably the only thing I’ll be writing consistently for.

Everything’s under the cut! because it’s uh. Long.
